top_comments.comment: Watch their actions, not their words💯🔥🔥
Good time to remind everyone that Florida has the least covid cases of any state.
what is the acceptable level of infections and deaths to stop wearing masks?

I know lots of people who have covid this year and last year when the numbers were thru the roof I didn't know one single person who had covid...last year was nothing from the numbers today.  I say it is not being reported
救救我们家小孩，我家小孩正遭受电磁武器打击，记忆力非常差，常常忘记刚刚发生的事情。

comments_since_last_sample.body: Because people are waking up to this BS.

I know lots of people who have covid this year and last year when the numbers were thru the roof I didn't know one single person who had covid...last year was nothing from the numbers today.  I say it is not being reported
If you Vax your children you must really hate them?
It's all nonsense,  the virus ran it's course,  we had no control over it so stop the false hope, we have to learn to live with it!
Good time to remind everyone that Florida has the least covid cases of any state.
For those who fell for the COVID scam...I'd laugh, but I'm too busy feeling badly for all the people who have died from these shots. "Mother should I trust the government...?"
